column8: Anger of the Beast by Applay

column2:
Powers up his Jaguar Sprint stance
Certain throws partially restore Heat meter
column7:
Useful as a long range whiff and block punisher
 Can be used as a guaranteed follow-up after a counterhit
 f,f,n,1+2 to activate heat.

column12: df+4,3 ⏵ b+1,2 T! ⏵ (dash, then sidewalk right)  1 ⏵ f,f,f+2+4

column7:
A safe mid heat engager that can be useful as an approach
 tool in the midrange
An inescapable high throw out of his Jaguar Sprint stance.

Safe mid heat engager that can be used as a follow-up
 after absorbing an attack with King's Muscle Armor.

Useful as a follow-up after f,f+2 on hit or even as a punish
 against moves that recover crouching.
column12: (sidestep right) f+3 ⏵ df+4,3 ⏵ b+1,2 T! ⏵ (3+4),3 ⏵ f,f,f+2+4

column7: Fast attack to start offense and check situations.

A mid poke to harass the opponent. It has a delayable
 (yet slightly unsafe) follow-up in df+2,1

High crushing low attack that gives you great frame avantage
 on hit to pressure the opponent.

Long range homing attack with counterhit properties. Use
 this to stop opponents from sidestepping away your other
 approach tools in the midrange.

A very fast mid counterhit confirmable launcher. Great to
  check opponents overextending ot attempting to sidestep
  away from your pressure.

column2:
f+1+2
CH f,f+1
CH db+4
CH (df+4,3),d+4

column7:
An armored stance you can use to deter approaching
 tools. Depending on what you absorb, it can allow you
 some guaranteed follow-ups.

As a grappler, incorporating his grabs is very important
 start with simple ones such as f,f,f+2+4 and f,hcf+1 and then
 learn his chain throws and possible routes.

column12:
After (3+4),3 you can Heat Burst into a heat dash move
for a guaranteed f,f,f+3+4 follow-up

b+1,2 can give a very high and far wall splat. For longer
distances, f+2,d+1,2 can be used
f+2+3 can be used to break walls, and f,f,f+2+4 for floor break
